cards.title: Landing page for business
cards.text: This is a small, one-page site that encourages the customer to take one specific action: for example, subscribe to a newsletter or order a product.
description: The perfect way to promote a new product.

With a landing page, you can introduce a new product to potential customers. Leads will have the opportunity to read about the features and benefits of the product on the web page. Thus, you will focus their attention on new products or services.

On a landing page, you provide visitors with information about a single product, which speeds up the decision-making process. They can focus on the relevant information without any other distractions and decide whether they want to proceed further.

cards.title: Corporate website
cards.text: This is a site with a specific catalog, through which goods are sold directly to the consumer, including delivery.

paragraphs: A corporate website is the official representation of a company on the Internet.
Typically, such a resource contains the company's history, mission, values, and vacancies. It also contains news, contacts, and may describe technological processes.
The list of goals for creating a corporate website can be expanded. They depend on what goal the owner wants to achieve.
description.listTitle: The main goals of its creation are as follows:
list: informing visitors about their activities and products.

cards.title: Business card website
cards.text: It is a virtual business card of a company or individual. The purpose is to introduce potential customers to the brand or its services.

paragraphs: A business card website is a virtual business card of a company or individual.
It is an important tool for presenting your company's services or personal brand. It provides information about you or your business.
With the help of such a site, you can attract new customers and maintain the interest of existing ones. For example, you can run a useful blog on the site or talk about promotions.

cards.title: Online store
cards.text: This is a site with a specific catalog, through which goods are sold directly to the consumer, including delivery.
description: An online store is a website with a product catalog that provides direct sales of products to the consumer, including their delivery.

All interaction — from familiarizing yourself with the product and placing an order to concluding a transaction — takes place directly on the website. The main difference between an online store and a traditional one is the lack of need for physical infrastructure.
If a regular store requires a sales floor, staff, display cases, and other equipment, an online store implements all these functions using software.
Opening your own online store is a step towards a higher level of customer service, which contributes not only to increased sales, but also to improving the company's image in the eyes of consumers.
